summary: SERVICE SHIFTER FLASHES ACROSS DASH. ALL OF THE GEAR LIGHTS REMAIN LIT. CAR JERKS HARD INTO GEAR. CAR WILL ONLY MOVE IN REVERSE. I HAVE HAD SEVERAL TRANSMISSION RELATED ISSUES REPAIRED BY THE JEEP DEALERSHIP SINCE I PURCHASED THE VEHICLE IN JUNE 2017. 6 MONTHS AFTER PURCHASE I STARTED HAVING TRANSMISSION RELATED ISSUES. ON 10/25/19, CAR WOULD NO LONGER SHIFT INTO DRIVE. I AM LIVID ABOUT THE SITUATION. WHILE STILL PAYING A CAR NOTE, I'M TOLD I NEED TO PAY 5600 FOR A NEW TRANSMISSION.
